name: Calmed by the Dark
description:
Calmed by the Dark

Game developed in RPG Maker MV.

Discover a  parallel dimension to ours in Calmed by the Dark, a dimension filled with mysteries, monsters and survivors. Learn how to master your powers and join a group that will shape the destiny.

Gameplay Mechanics:

  • RPG Elements ( i.e. upgrading your character health, damage, armor stats and more.);
  • Choices: Some choices affect story, gameplay and characters;
  • City Administration: Recruit members, buy buildings and manage your army.
  • Combat: Test your strategy using dash, special attacks, fast attacks and strong attacks in a dynamic combat system;
  • Time Cycle: Some events will only happen at some specific time;
  • Become a Legend: Use your powers to decide the fate of everyone or maybe don't and just see what happens.
  • Date: Find a special one and take her to a cinema, restaurant, see the sky or maybe go to a bar.
  • World: Play in world filled with dangerous, people, collectibles and secrets.

System Requirements:

  • CPU: Intel Core i3 or better
  • RAM: 8 GB
  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • VIDEO CARD: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • FREE DISK SPACE: 700 Mb
  • DISPLAY: 1280x768 or better
